content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Good afternoon, Mr. Li. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. Based on your interest and the current market rates, I would like to propose a rental price of 900 Euros per month. This price includes all utilities and maintenance costs. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am a student, so I am not very familiar with the rental market in Mannheim. Can you tell me more about the average rental price for a 25 square meter apartment in Mannheim?

Also, I am looking for a long-term rental agreement, preferably for at least one year. Is this possible?

Thank you for your help.

Bo Li
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Of course, Mr. Li. I would be happy to provide you with some information about the rental market in Mannheim. The average rental price for a 25 square meter apartment in Mannheim is around 700-800 Euros per month, including utilities and maintenance costs. However, the actual rental price can vary depending on factors such as location, condition of the apartment, and availability.

As for a long-term rental agreement, yes, it is definitely possible. A one-year rental agreement is a common length of time for tenants in Mannheim, and I would be happy to discuss the terms and conditions of such an agreement with you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am interested in the apartment you have shown me. Can I negotiate the rental price with you?

Also, I would prefer to have a written agreement that outlines the terms and conditions of the rental. Is this possible?

Thank you for your help.

Bo Li

PS: I am looking for a furnished apartment.

PPS: I would like to pay the rental price in advance, so I can avoid any fees or charges.

PPPS: I would like to pay the rental price in cash.

PPPPS: Can I move in on the 1st of next month?

PPPPPS: Can you provide me with a list of all the necessary documents that I will need to provide for the rental agreement?

PPPPPPP: Can I sign the rental agreement online?
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Dear Mr. Li,

Thank you for your interest in the apartment I showed you. I would be happy to negotiate the rental price with you. Based on your preferences and the current market rates, I would like to propose a rental price of 1000 Euros per month. This price includes all utilities and maintenance costs, as well as a furnished apartment.

Regarding the written agreement, yes, it is possible to have a written agreement that outlines the terms and conditions of the rental. We can discuss the details of the agreement and have it drafted by a notary public.

As for payment, you can pay the rental price in advance to avoid any fees or charges. I would be happy to discuss the payment options with you in more detail.

Regarding your move-in date, I would be happy to accommodate your request to move in on the 1st of next month.

In terms of the necessary documents, we will need to see your identity documents, proof of income, and a rental reference. We can provide you with a list of all the necessary documents in detail.

Finally, it is possible to sign the rental agreement online, but we will need to ensure that all the necessary legal requirements are met.

I look forward to hearing back from you and working with you to finalize the rental agreement.

Best regards,
Heinrich Heine
name: Heinrich Heine
